title: OCTRA v1.2.0 Enhancements
content:
• 2D-Editor: audio playback starts automatically after entering a segment
  • Now ogg Vorbis audio format is supported
  • Texteditors now support Copy & Paste
  • Now you can set Boundaries in an existing full text
  • More import data formats (Textgrid, CTM and raw text file)
  • Usability and Design improvements
  • 2D-Editor: While audio playing the view follows the cursor

title: OCTRA v1.1.0 Enhancements
content:
• Progressbar that shows the current loading progress
  • Now the guidelines can be converted to PDF automatically
  • In "Overview" you can now select a segment number to go to this segment directly.
  • Improved usability
